metadata.synopsis: One liner for a Bhaal Cultist hiding in plain sight a tthe back of the Lower City Park
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Cirian at the back of the Lower City by the pool, coords are -97, 29, -20 in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: Cirian
0.text: People drop stacks of coins in that fountain... If you nick some, I won't tell!
0.context: NodeContext: italicised lines are whispered consipiratiroially

1.speaker: Cirian
1.text: Greetings, stranger. Say, have you visited the wishing fountain? Lovely place.
